TopicTitle: Modern day fighter jet replicas [F16, EA-18G, F-35C, Mig-29, Dassault Rafale]

Articles.Content:
A couple of jets i decided to replicate in KSP, a couple of which i'm less proud of as i think i could've made them alot better but i won't change them for now. Mods used are Pwing, BDarmory, Bdynamics, FAR and procedural parts.

**!NOTE: Scroll down for more pics, any updates to the crafts and/or new ones will be added in the form of a post, too lazy to just update op!**

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-03T03:32:59Z" title="08/03/2015 03:32  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 3, 2015</time> by Trollkowski**
Looks remarkably detailed! I applaud your work ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Very nice, but isin't this 0.90?

Indeed it is, i'm pretty much not going play 1.xx until pwing gets updated since it's the mod i by far use the most

Updated the EA-18G, fixed the cockpit, corrected the intakes and refurbished the whole body to make it sleeker (at the cost of a sliiightly higher part count, totally worth it).

![6VBufri.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/6VBufri.jpg)

![yMx87IT.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/yMx87IT.jpg)

![pU6LPxk.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/pU6LPxk.jpg)

![LXge9Dq.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/LXge9Dq.jpg)
What are the part counts/mass for these planes?
Holy sht dude these are awesome. That f-16 is bad ass looking.

> 
> What are the part counts/mass for these planes?

Part count ranges from around 180 - 260, with the mig-29 being the most part heavy. 

Unsure about mass though, no idea how to check it ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Also, i chose not to include the f-35 here since it's absolutely terrible, i can barely get it off the runway let alone keep it from crashing into the sea.

One thing i noticed with all of these though (besides the f-35 ofc) is that they're all capable of performing the pugachev's cobra.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-02T16:30:20Z" title="08/02/2015 04:30  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 2, 2015</time> by Trollkowski**

Not sure if you do this, but I found this thread yesterday and I was wondering if you had .craft downloads? If you don't have them I'm ok with them but if you do I would appreciate a link. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Not sure if you do this, but I found this thread yesterday and I was wondering if you had .craft downloads? If you don't have them I'm ok with them but if you do I would appreciate a link. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Well i could upload the craft files for you, but a variety of mods have been used on these, and the engines they use have been modified for a higher power output so they won't be as efficient, i'll fix that later though.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-17T22:54:34Z" title="08/17/2015 10:54  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 17, 2015</time> by Trollkowski**
Cousin accidentally deleted my career, along with every craft i made, so no downloads for any of the crafts here, should have uploaded the .craft files sooner, but meh :/
